!Fishermen's Guild Member: On Devil's Isle, if you hunt *Zaken's Archers, mardians, pirate zombies, tainted ogres, Fiend Archers, Zaken's royal guard, Pirate Zombie Captains, Vale Masters, or Unpleasant Hummings*, you can get the sweet aromatic fluid the water spirits love.
